summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the Superintendent to accept an $11,000 donation from the Seattle Aquarium Society (SEAS) given by The Bishop Foundation and The Wyman Foundation Trusts to develop the Puget Sound on Wheels Traveling Exhibit, authorizing the Superintendent to create and establish the necessary position and providing for a reimbursable Park Fund appropriation to the 1987 Department Budget.
